description:
Kurutsu is http://anidb.net/ch88075 [Ugaki]`s partner and a part of Demi-Human Crimes Division. He has a blond hair and blue eyes, and is really bad at telling lies. Despite his appearance, he has great physical strength and agility, which he demonstrated after subduing Ugaki by mistake.
Ugaki said that he`s division`s main weapon against succubi, apparently due to his immunity to succubus` aphrodisiac effect.
name: Kurutsu
